column5: This is a wonderful, modern home sitting on one of Westlake Hills most beautiful roads. A wooded retreat, on over an acre; yet less than 4 miles from downtown. Home has been completely updated with great care. Warm, contemporary style with vaulted wood ceilings, a limestone fireplace, built-ins, and a sensible floor plan. Outdoor spaces with big decks overlooking the creek, and neat bridge that enters onto the property. Excellent interior light and private, natural setting.
column8: Modern Home sleeps 8, close to downtown, 1 acre
